name: Metric Fast-Forward: extended with numerical state variables
description: The system is an extension of the FF planner to numerical state variables, more precisely to PDDL2.1 level 2.

args.description:
Search configuration [preset: s=0]; '+H': helpful actions pruning
 0     Standard-FF: EHC+H then BFS (cost minimization: NO)
 1     BFS (cost minimization: NO)
 2     BFS+H (cost minimization: NO)
 3     Weighted A* (cost minimization: YES)
 4     A*epsilon (cost minimization: YES)
 5     EHC+H then A*epsilon (cost minimization: YES)
